powers.name: Mirro-Portal
powers.description: Creates the dome that is necessary to use any other power.

powers.name: Reflection
powers.description: Moves all entities inside the dome (room) in random locations inside the dome.

powers.name: Mirro-Trap
powers.description: Quicly moves player towards another player. Upon impact causes great damage.

powers.name: Mirro-World
powers.description: Makes blocks float and throws them in random directions.
